items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Enable users to share their fitness activities and achievements with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: Users can post completed workouts to a social feed.
Friends can view, like, and comment on shared activities.
non_functional: Feed updates should load within 2 seconds.
Support at least 10,000 concurrent users without performance degradation.

items.title: Friend Management
items.description: Allow users to search for, add, and remove friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: Users can search for friends by username or email.
Users can send, accept, and decline friend requests.
non_functional: Search results should return within 1 second for up to 1,000 matches.

notes: The requirement is high-level; assumptions made about specific social features include activity feed, likes, comments, and friend management.
